subject: Character Demo - "Yun Jin: The True Meaning of Opera" | Genshin Impact
content:
The people of Liyue who frequent the opera know that besides opera that focuses on the supernatural,

the new opera performances written by Yun Jin which sing about humanity and the many faces of the world are also masterpieces.

Each song brings deep emotion to the audience that one cannot help but sigh when the song is over.

Life mirrors opera, and so the beauty of flowers and the moon tells of reality.

And just as opera reflects life, why not make the most of every moment?
contentOriginal:

subject: "How gently do the clouds and flowers sway, as dancing winds meander through the vales."
content:
Hi Travelers~


Today, we'd like to introduce you to the director and mainstay of the Yun-Han Opera Troupe — Yun Jin!


While one can always get delicious delicacies or good storytelling as long as one knows where to look, Yun Jin's performance does not just await one there.


​

​

​

​

​

​

​

​

subject: Voice Artist Announcement
content:
"My hobbies? Well, opera, of course! It's what I truly love and it's what I will be pursuing for the rest of my life."

Travelers, let's listen to the voice of "Stage Lucida" Yun Jin!


Voice Artist

EN VA: Judy Alice Lee & Yang Yang

JP VA: KOIWAI Kotori ＆ Yang Yang


>>>Click here to listen <<<

subject: Genshin Impact EP - A Moment of Tranquility in the Eradication of Evil
content:
Through thousands of calamities and adversities, the evil of lingering malice will be purged.

While gazing at the flowing rivers and towering mountains, one can enjoy a moment of peace.



#01. Above the Sea of Clouds - 0:00

#02. Winding River - 0:58

#03. Sojourner's Sweet Dream - 1:58
contentOriginal:

subject: Character Demo - "Shenhe: Crane in the Wild" | Genshin Impact
content:
Among the villagers who often traverse the mountains, there is a saying that goes like this:


When walking in the mountains, one must keep your eyes and ears wide open at all times to stay vigilant against evil spirits.


If you hear a mournful cry of cranes and feel a strong gust of wind wrapped in frost, it means that an exorcist or an adeptus is close by, slaying demons.


If that happens, take a detour and nothing should happen to you.
contentOriginal:
Among the villagers who often traverse the mountains, there is a saying that goes like this:


When walking in the mountains, one must keep your eyes and ears wide open at all times to stay vigilant against evil spirits.


If you hear a mournful cry of cranes and feel a strong gust of wind wrapped in frost, it means that an exorcist or an adeptus is close by, slaying demons.


If that happens, take a detour and nothing should happen to you.

subject: Collected Miscellany - "Shenhe: Fluttering of Frosty Feathers" | Genshin Impact
content:
When travelers set foot in Jueyun Karst, it is common for them to feel envious of the carefree wild cranes in the clouds.


But what they don't know is that when the cranes go where the wind takes them, they are lost as to where this path leads.
contentOriginal:
When travelers set foot in Jueyun Karst, it is common for them to feel envious of the carefree wild cranes in the clouds.


But what they don't know is that when the cranes go where the wind takes them, they are lost as to where this path leads.

subject: "A Study in Potions" Gameplay Details
content:
The "A Study in Potions" event is about to begin. The Mondstadt alchemist Timaeus is attempting to create a legendary alchemical medication. Help him complete this line of research, and you may obtain some rich rewards...


Additionally, new missions have also been added to Oceansong. Complete them to receive BEP.

​


〓Event Duration〓

Event Gameplay Period: 2022/1/7 10:00 – 2022/1/17 03:59 (Server Time)


〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 30 or above

And complete the Archon Quest "Farewell, Archaic Lord"

​

​

​

​

​

subject: Story Teaser: The Divine Damsel of Devastation | Genshin Impact
content:
A strange tale that tells of adeptal affinity, where things are no longer what they once were, save for the thousands of threads of sorrow.

The opera sings about the feats of a heroine, with new lines added to the story, and told anew in many homes.
contentOriginal:
A strange tale that tells of adeptal affinity, where things are no longer what they once were, save for the thousands of threads of sorrow.

The opera sings about the feats of a heroine, with new lines added to the story, and told anew in many homes.

subject: Collected Miscellany - "Yun Jin: Showstopper" | Genshin Impact
content:
The people of Liyue love listening to Liyue opera, and the fans are always impressed by the singing and acting skills of the renowned opera singer Yun Jin.


They are in awe at Yun Jin's graceful fights on stage, but do not know that her skills with the spear are real enough to defend against her foes.
contentOriginal:
The people of Liyue love listening to Liyue opera, and the fans are always impressed by the singing and acting skills of the renowned opera singer Yun Jin.


They are in awe at Yun Jin's graceful fights on stage, but do not know that her skills with the spear are real enough to defend against her foes.

subject: Enchanting Journey of Snow and Stars: Illuminating Event in the Alps (Teaser 2) | Genshin Impact
content:
Travelers, thank you for taking part in the "Enchanting Journey of Snow and Stars" web event! We have successfully reached our goal of reaching a total of 1 million participants!


A million rays of shimmering light have gathered, coalescing into a sea of stars!


As promised, we will light up the Teleport Waypoint on the Alps on January 13.


A journey to another world and new adventures begin with you!

Teaser Link: 


Please follow our official social media accounts for more details!

Waypoint Lighting Ceremony Broadcast Time and Platform:

Twitch: January 13, 2022, 22:00 (UTC+8)

Youtube/VK: January 13, 2022, 23:00 (UTC+8)

subject: "Windtrace" Event: Compete and Earn Primogems
content:
During the event period, Travelers can take part in a game of Windtrace at Gygax's, and obtain Windtrace Coins to receive rewards such as Primogems, Talent Level-Up Materials, Character EXP Materials, and Mora.


〓Event Duration〓

2022/01/13 10:00:00 – 2022/01/27 03:59:59


〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above


〓Event Details〓

● On the first day of the event, the maximum number of Windtrace Coins you can obtain is 1,200. This amount will increase gradually for each of the 6 days after that, up to a maximum of 6,000 Windtrace Coins. Use the matching function to find randomized games and obtain Windtrace Coins.


● Accumulate certain amounts of Windtrace Coins to claim the corresponding rewards. Complete Windtrace Challenges to obtain additional Mora rewards.


● When participating in Windtrace, the unlocked "Contested Zone" will be randomly selected for the game. Travelers can unlock the "Contested Zone" by unlocking the Statue of the Seven in the corresponding area. The "Contested Zones" in Inazuma can only be unlocked by completing the Quest "Ritou Escape Plan" and unlocking the Statue of the Seven in the area. Travelers can view the currently unlocked content through the preview of the "Contested Zone" in the game overview.


※ Windtrace Coins can only be obtained while playing in randomized games using the matching function. You will be unable to obtain Windtrace Coins while playing in a custom Co-Op party.
contentOriginal:
During the event period, Travelers can take part in a game of Windtrace at Gygax's, and obtain Windtrace Coins to receive rewards such as Primogems, Talent Level-Up Materials, Character EXP Materials, and Mora.


〓Event Duration〓

2022/01/13 10:00:00 – 2022/01/27 03:59:59


〓Eligibility〓

〓Event Details〓

● On the first day of the event, the maximum number of Windtrace Coins you can obtain is 1,200. This amount will increase gradually for each of the 6 days after that, up to a maximum of 6,000 Windtrace Coins. Use the matching function to find randomized games and obtain Windtrace Coins.


● Accumulate certain amounts of Windtrace Coins to claim the corresponding rewards. Complete Windtrace Challenges to obtain additional Mora rewards.


● When participating in Windtrace, the unlocked "Contested Zone" will be randomly selected for the game. Travelers can unlock the "Contested Zone" by unlocking the Statue of the Seven in the corresponding area. The "Contested Zones" in Inazuma can only be unlocked by completing the Quest "Ritou Escape Plan" and unlocking the Statue of the Seven in the area. Travelers can view the currently unlocked content through the preview of the "Contested Zone" in the game overview.


※ Windtrace Coins can only be obtained while playing in randomized games using the matching function. You will be unable to obtain Windtrace Coins while playing in a custom Co-Op party.

subject: The World of Opera: A Behind the Scenes Look at the Creation of Yun Jin | Genshin Impact
content: "How gently do the clouds and flowers sway, as dancing winds meander through the vales." As the current Director of the Yun-Han Opera Troupe, Yun Jin has not only inherited the mantle from her ancestors, but also added her own insight on hopes and dreams of ordinary people through her thousands of performances. Let's take a look at how the Genshin Impact team brought Yun Jin to life!
contentOriginal: "How gently do the clouds and flowers sway, as dancing winds meander through the vales." As the current Director of the Yun-Han Opera Troupe, Yun Jin has not only inherited the mantle from her ancestors, but also added her own insight on hopes and dreams of ordinary people through her thousands of performances. Let's take a look at how the Genshin Impact team brought Yun Jin to life!

subject: Genshin Impact EP - Trail of the Radiant Qilin
content:
In a grand pavilion, a silhouette passes by in a hurry while it drizzles in the city.

A boat floats idly on the moonlit waters outside of town, as faint traces of the Qilin could be seen.




#01. Gentle Rain - 0:00

#02. Palace of Jadeite - 0:58

#03. Adeptus' Retirement - 2:35

subject: "Fleeting Colors in Flight" Gameplay Details
content:
The new event "Fleeting Colors in Flight" is about to begin!


Look, people are hanging the lights up and breaking out their instruments! It's a new year, and Liyue Harbor is bustling with preparations for the grand celebration of the Lantern Rite Festival...

​

New missions have also been added to Oceansong. Complete them to receive BEP.

​


〓Event Duration〓

Gameplay Duration: 2022/1/25 10:00 – 2022/2/12 03:59 (Server Time)

Event Shop Duration: 2022/1/25 10:00 – 2022/2/14 03:59 (Server Time)


〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 28 or above

Complete the Archon Quest "Chapter I: Act III - A New Star Approaches" and Archon Quest Interlude Chapter: Act I - "The Crane Returns on the Wind"


〓Gameplay Overview〓

"Fleeting Colors in Flight" consists of four themes: Flameplume Starflowers, The Great Gathering, Wondrous Shadows, and Oceanic Defender. Let's take a look at the gameplay for these themes~

​

​

​

​

​

​

​

​

〓Event Rewards〓

​

​

subject: Genshin Impact EP - The Joys of Leisure and Pleasure
content:
An ancient city, both prosperous in day and night.

A thousand cups filled with moonlight, shine brightly in the dreams of spring and autumn past.
contentOriginal:
An ancient city, both prosperous in day and night.

A thousand cups filled with moonlight, shine brightly in the dreams of spring and autumn past.

subject: "The World Is Ever-Changing, but the Rock Is Unwavering"
content:
Traveler, did you hear? There is a really big and special tree near Nantianmen!


A few days ago, someone had just gone there to play and happened upon Zhongli, the Traveler, and Paimon! What were they doing together under the tree?


The Event Wish "Gentry of Hermitage" will be available after January 25 18:00! During this period, "Vago Mundo" Zhongli (Geo) will receive a huge drop-rate boost, so don't miss out~
contentOriginal:
Traveler, did you hear? There is a really big and special tree near Nantianmen!


A few days ago, someone had just gone there to play and happened upon Zhongli, the Traveler, and Paimon! What were they doing together under the tree?


The Event Wish "Gentry of Hermitage" will be available after January 25 18:00! During this period, "Vago Mundo" Zhongli (Geo) will receive a huge drop-rate boost, so don't miss out~

subject: "Hmm... The Scent of Sweet Flowers..."
content: Today, when I was exploring the mountains of Liyue, I accidentally bumped into Ganyu who was taking an afternoon nap under a tree! Seeing that she slept so soundly, I didn't want to disturb her and left quietly...
contentOriginal: Today, when I was exploring the mountains of Liyue, I accidentally bumped into Ganyu who was taking an afternoon nap under a tree! Seeing that she slept so soundly, I didn't want to disturb her and left quietly...

subject: GENSHIN CONCERT Special Edition Preview｜Genshin Impact
content:
To show our appreciation for Travelers' support and faith, Genshin Impact will join forces with the Shanghai Symphony Orchestra to present the beautiful melody of Spring Festival to the Travelers – GENSHIN CONCERT Special Edition: "Reflections of Spring."


This special edition will feature a selection of seven tracks and is expected to run for 21 minutes. Travelers, please stay tuned!
contentOriginal:
To show our appreciation for Travelers' support and faith, Genshin Impact will join forces with the Shanghai Symphony Orchestra to present the beautiful melody of Spring Festival to the Travelers – GENSHIN CONCERT Special Edition: "Reflections of Spring."


This special edition will feature a selection of seven tracks and is expected to run for 21 minutes. Travelers, please stay tuned!

subject: Fleeting Colors in Flight Event Cutscene Animation: "Age of Flowing Hues" | Genshin Impact
content:
Blazing fireworks scatter across the sky like stars, welcoming prosperous times.


Their splendid colors and dazzling lights carry the countless wishes of the people, that the mountains and the moon retain their eternal beauty.
contentOriginal:
Blazing fireworks scatter across the sky like stars, welcoming prosperous times.


Their splendid colors and dazzling lights carry the countless wishes of the people, that the mountains and the moon retain their eternal beauty.
